mapper.sql: id, org_key, org_id, org_name, org_type_id, parent_id, created_on, created_by, updated_on, updated_by, description, created_by_type, updated_by_type, org_owner, status, email, social_credit_code, company_name, max_dept_high
mapper.select:
SELECT (SELECT username FROM `user` WHERE id = o.created_by) as created_by, o.id, o.org_id, o.status, o.org_name, o.org_key, o.org_Owner, ug.to_dept_id as dept_id, d.department_name as dept_name, o.org_type_id, ot.name as org_type_name, u.phone_number, u.username, o.created_on, o.company_name, o.social_credit_code, o.created_by_type, o.source FROM organization o join user u on u.id = o.org_owner left join user_grant ug on ug.org_id=o.id left join department d on d.id = ug.to_dept_id left join organization_type ot on o.org_type_id=ot.id
AND o.org_type_id >= 10 and o.deleted_flag = 0 and u.deleted_flag = 0
AND ug.to_dept_id in
#{item}
AND o.org_name like CONCAT('%',#{orgName},'%')
AND o.social_credit_code like CONCAT('%',#{socialCreditCode},'%')
AND o.id = #{orgId}
ORDER BY o.id DESC
select * from user where id in (select pk_user_id from user_org where pk_org_id = #{id}) order by last_online_on desc limit 1
select COUNT(0) from organization o, user_grant ug where ug.to_dept_id = #{deptId} and o.id = ug.org_id
SELECT lt.id from label_type lt where label_type = 0 and lt.label_name = ( SELECT lt2.label_name from org_label ol left join label_type lt2 on ol.label_id = lt2.id where ol.org_id = #{orgId} )
select ol.label_id from org_label ol left join department d on d.pk_org_id = ol.org_id where d.`path` = #{path}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO org_label (org_id, label_id, label_name, create_by, create_time ) values (#{orgId}, #{labelId}, #{labelName}, #{createdBy}, #{createTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE org_label SET label_id = #{labelId}, label_name = #{labelName}, update_by= #{updatedBy}, update_time= #{updatedOn} WHERE org_id = #{orgId}
mapper.select: select pk_org_id from user_org where pk_user_id = (select u.id from user u where u.phone_number = #{safePhoneNum} and user_type = 1 and deleted_flag = 0)
